sentences.en: ...underground deposits of gold and diamonds.
sentences.cn: …黄金和钻石的地下矿床。

sentences.en: A 10% deposit is payable in advance.
sentences.cn: 须预付10%的押金。

sentences.en: A refundable deposit is payable on arrival.
sentences.cn: 可退还订金到店即可退还。

sentences.en: A returnable deposit is payable on arrival.
sentences.cn: 抵达时应支付可退还押金。

sentences.en: As the river slows down, it deposits a layer of soil.
sentences.cn: 河水流速变慢时，一层泥土便沉积下来。

sentences.en: fatty deposits on the heart
sentences.cn: 心脏上沉积的脂肪层

sentences.en: Higher-rate deposit accounts yield good returns.
sentences.cn: 高利率的存款会产生丰厚的收益。

sentences.en: I have placed money on deposit in a bank.
sentences.cn: 我已把钱存入一家银行.

sentences.en: I’d like to make a deposit (= pay some money ) into my savings account.
sentences.cn: 我想存一笔钱到我的储蓄账户里。

sentences.en: If you cancel your flight, you will forfeit your deposit.
sentences.cn: 乘客取消航班订位，定金概不退还。

sentences.en: It is safest to deposit your money in the bank.
sentences.cn: 钱存入银行最保险.

sentences.en: Landlords can charge a returnable deposit.
sentences.cn: 房东可以收取一笔可退还的押金。

sentences.en: The customer has to deposit a minimum of $100 monthly.
sentences.cn: 顾客每月必须至少存入$100。

sentences.en: The female deposits her eggs directly into the water.
sentences.cn: 雌性把卵直接产在水中。

sentences.en: The hotel requires a deposit for all advance bookings.
sentences.cn: 旅馆规定凡预订房间都要先付订金.

sentences.en: The undersigned buyers agree to pay a 5,000 pound deposit.
sentences.cn: 已签名的买主同意支付5,000英镑的订金。

sentences.en: There is some deposit in the bottom of the flask.
sentences.cn: 这只烧杯的底部有些沉淀物.

sentences.en: There is too much deposit in a bottle of wine.
sentences.cn: 酒瓶里有太多的沉淀物.

sentences.en: This is more like a downpayment, or a deposit, if you like.
sentences.cn: 这更像是首付，也可以说是定金。

sentences.en: We ask for one month’s rent in advance, plus a deposit of 500.
sentences.cn: 我们要求预付一个月的租金，再加500美元的押金。

sentences.en: We've put down a 5% deposit on the house.
sentences.cn: 我们已支付了房款的5%作为订金。

sentences.en: You are advised to deposit your valuables in the hotel safe.
sentences.cn: 建议您把贵重物品存到酒店保险箱里。

sentences.en: You may deposit your returned books with the librarian.
sentences.cn: 你可以把要还的书留在图书管理员处.

words.tran_cn: 受托人；受托公司；储藏所

phrases.tran_cn: 美国联邦存款保险公司

trans.tran_cn: 订金，押金，存款，竞选保证金，沉淀物
trans.tran_en: a part of the cost of something you are buying that you pay some time before you pay the rest of it
an amount of money that is paid into a bank account
an amount of money that is paid into a bank account

trans.tran_cn: 放下，存放，存入银行账户，使沉淀
trans.tran_en: to put something down in a particular place

trans.tran_cn: 使沉淀； 存放， 寄存； 储蓄
trans.tran_en: to put something down in a particular place
If you deposit a sum of money, you put it into a bank account or savings account
